description: Configuration schema for SnapsInAZfs' monitoring capabilities

$comments.description: Comments about this document. Not used in configuration validation.

Enabled.description: Global enable setting for all monitoring functionality. If true, monitoring is allowed. If false, all monitoring is disabled.

TcpListenerEnabled.description: Enable listening for HTTP monitoring requests via TCP

TcpListenerPort.description: If TCP listener is enabled, listen on this port

UnixSocketEnabled.description: Enable listening for HTTP monitoring requests via unix socket. Use if monitoring locally or with a reverse proxy.

UnixSocketPath.description: If unix socket is enabled, use this path
